previewArticle.title: Brazil vs. Chile: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Round of 16 Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Brazil 1 (3), Chile 1 (2): 2014 FIFA World Cup | Round of 16 Match Recap

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Falla Jara, y Brasil de mete a cuartos de final. Chile queda eliminado #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Marcelo Díaz (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fernandinho (Brazil).

timelineItems.name: Paul Burton
timelineItems.text: Chile's national anthem should be the chorus of Michael Jackson's Beat It but with every word replaced by the word "Chile" #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Thiago Silva (Brazil).
Arturo Vidal (Chile) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Hulk (Brazil).
Arturo Vidal (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: David Hack
timelineItems.text: Chile have to target Marcelo, such a dreadful full back, makes loads of mistakes. Neymar Crocker? #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Transponster
timelineItems.text: I hope Alexi Sanchez and company rain all over Brazil's world cup parade. #BRAVCHI chi chi chi le le le le!!

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Jô (Brazil) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Marcelo.

timelineItems.name: Matt Towers
timelineItems.text: Jo always looks so surprised #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: JULIE
timelineItems.text: If this match goes to penalties I'll be a nervous wreck! #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Solly Flox
timelineItems.text: Chile should be pressing for a goal. Why change up your whole strategy for a toss-up with PKs? #VamosChile #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Oscar (Brazil) header from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Hulk with a cross.
Oscar (Brazil) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Charles Aránguiz (Chile).

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: Jo can't even stay on his feet when taking an unchallenged shot… #oldhabitsdiehard #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Nurudeen Obalola
timelineItems.text: If I was Scolari I'd order Ramires to get forward...he could produce a convincing dive in the box #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Jeffrey Guity
timelineItems.text: Fifa needs bring back the golden goal ASAP. #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: David Luiz (Brazil) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Mauricio Pinilla (Chile).

timelineItems.name: Billy Williamson
timelineItems.text: Never thought I'd see Brazil relying on the long ball. It's like watching Rangers last season. #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Hulk (Brazil) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Foul by David Luiz (Brazil).
Alexis Sánchez (Chile) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: nigglet
timelineItems.text: Hulk! omg, you broke his ankles haha #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Francisco Silva (Chile).
Neymar (Brazil) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Brazil. David Luiz tries a through ball, but Neymar is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: osahi uwaifo
timelineItems.text: Now that Brazil are keeping the ball and playing short passes instead of long balls, they're playing better #BRAvCHI #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dani Alves (Brazil).
Mauricio Pinilla (Chile) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Alexis Sánchez (Chile) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right from a direct free kick.
First Half Extra Time ends, Brazil 1, Chile 1.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Regroup. #BRAvCHI http://t.co/AgJ9HDsR6x

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Regroup. #BRAvCHI http://t.co/AgJ9HDsR6x

timelineItems.name: Steve Corrigan
timelineItems.text: Why is Andre Agassi coaching Chile? #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: George Scriban
timelineItems.text: Why is Chile’s personal trainer yelling at the team at the break? Did they not wipe down the equipment? #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Second Half Extra Time begins Brazil 1, Chile 1.
Corner,  Brazil. Conceded by Gary Medel.

timelineItems.name: Mónica Estrada
timelineItems.text: This is like the Hunger Games of soccer #BRAvCHI #CHI

timelineItems.name: Clarence Watts
timelineItems.text: 15min......glory OR pain! #bravchi

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jô (Brazil) header from the left side of the six yard box is too high. Assisted by Neymar with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Alf Love
timelineItems.text: As a neutral armchair fan would love a penalty shootout just for the prolonged excitement. #WC2014 #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Fiona Barrows
timelineItems.text: I lived in Chile for 6 months, and it is one of the friendliest, most beautiful countries I've ever visited. COME ON CHILE #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Gary Medel (Chile) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Leonard Masilela
timelineItems.text: Howard Webb has a tendency and reputation of spoiling good football with his dodgy decisions #BravChi

timelineItems.comment: Arturo Vidal (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Foul by Francisco Silva (Chile).

timelineItems.name: Pardeep Cattry
timelineItems.text: #CHI getting beat up. I wonder how much longer they can last. #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Petri van Zyl
timelineItems.text: Get up you're not dying or even injured #BRAvCHI

Attempt missed. Marcelo Díaz (Chile) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Charles Aránguiz.

timelineItems.name: Andile Makho Dlamini
timelineItems.text: Without stating the obvious, #Chile are going for penalties #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Hulk (Brazil) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Eugenio Mena (Chile).

timelineItems.name: Peter Clarke
timelineItems.text: Hulk is soft. #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Victoria Grayson
timelineItems.text: É falta atrás de falta. Acho bom eles não se machucarem muito não. A Dilma construiu estádios, não hospitais #BrasilVsChile #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ramires (Brazil).
Felipe Gutierrez (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Sam Child
timelineItems.text: I'd feel robbed if we don't get penalties at the end of this! #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Mister Craig
timelineItems.text: Oi, Sanchez. Get the shorts sorted. Half expecting to see balls and boabie every time he is on the ball #budgiesmugglers #BraVChi #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Felipe Gutierrez (Chile).
Marcelo (Brazil) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Martin Rogers
timelineItems.text: Hard to know what to think if this does go to a shootout. Chile looks totally spent, but Bravo is a superb keeper... #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hulk (Brazil) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Luiz Gustavo.

timelineItems.name: Travelabella
timelineItems.text: This game should be tasty-end to end football #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Mauricio Pinilla (Chile) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Alexis Sánchez.

timelineItems.name: Mike Pacific
timelineItems.text: HO-LY! Brazil better make a statue of that crossbar. #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Morgan Davis
timelineItems.text: This is one hell of a game #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Braves79
timelineItems.text: Wow....off the bar. Almost. #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Brazil. Conceded by José Rojas.
Attempt missed. Ramires (Brazil) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Willian following a corner.
Second Half Extra Time ends, Brazil 1, Chile 1.

timelineItems.name: Nick Eagle
timelineItems.text: Penalties in #BRAvCHI Much easier to watch when they don't involve a team you support!

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: You got this. #BRAvCHI https://t.co/km8xkTa4uY

timelineItems.name: Rich Barnett
timelineItems.text: What a game! Chile deserve to go through 100% just can't see Brazil losing this shoot out though.... #BRAvCHI #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Vusi Ntlakana
timelineItems.text: The moment if truth has arrived. Who will be heroes/villains?! Whoever holds their nerves will win this one! #BRAvCHI #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Arlo White
timelineItems.text: If #CHI win the shoot-out, that small pocket of red in a stadium of yellow will become the Spartans at the Battle of Thermopylae. #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Sumanth Sunkari
timelineItems.text: Backing Chile in this penalty shootout. Nothing to lose for them! Brazil on the other hand ... pressure. #BRAvCHI #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Benny Robinson
timelineItems.text: Incredible tension right now. No matter where in the world you are you can feel it. #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Andy Carroll
timelineItems.text: Squeeky bum time #BRAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Penalty Shootout begins Brazil 1, Chile 1.
Goal!  Brazil 1(1), Chile 1. David Luiz (Brazil) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
